rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型抗病毒蛋白 SAMD9L 阻断 HIV-1 和其他慢病毒研究人员发现，干扰素刺激的 SAMD9L 通过抑制病毒翻译和内体运输来限制 HIV-1 和其他慢病毒，而 SAMD9 则增强 HIV-1 复制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Novel-antiviral- Protein-SAMD9L-blocks-HIV-1-and-other-lentiviruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Novel-antiviral- Protein-SAMD9L-blocks-HIV-1-and-other-lentiviruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=027ea88a-518d-4a64-8028-563c0239a7b8 Sun, 07 Jul 2024 22:19:00 -0400 Novel antiviral protein SAMD9L blocks HIV-1 and other lentiviruses
研究发现，有针对性地补充维生素 D 可降低维生素 D 缺乏者患抑郁症的风险对维生素 D 水平较低的人进行有针对性的补充可以降低患抑郁症的风险，但对慢性疼痛或其他疾病没有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Targeted-vitamin-D-supplementation-may-lower-depression-risk-for-deficient-individuals-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Targeted-vitamin-D-supplementation-may-lower-depression-risk-for-deficient-individuals-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f36c245-e170-47a4-961a-ff162b256a34 Sun, 07 Jul 2024 21:19:00 -0400 Targeted vitamin D supplementation may lower depression risk for deficient individuals, study finds
研究表明轮班工作会增加男性早泄的风险最近的一项研究将轮班工作和轮班工作睡眠障碍 (SWSD) 与男性工人早泄 (PE) 的风险增加联系起来。研究结果强调了睡眠中断和长时间轮班工作如何影响生殖健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Study-suggests-shift-work-increases-risk-of-premature-ejaculation-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Study-suggests-shift-work-increases-risk-of-premature-ejaculation-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daab582a-c568-4422-9444-78fa639c6015 Sun, 07 Jul 2024 20:42:00 -0400 Study suggests shift work increases risk of premature ejaculation in men
研究表明加密货币所有者具有独特的心理和政治特征最近的一项研究将加密货币所有权与各种政治、心理和社会特征联系起来。调查结果显示，这与阴谋思维、极端主义政治观点以及自恋和精神病等“黑暗”人格特征有很强的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Study-suggests-cryptocurrency-owners-share-unique-psychological-and-political-traits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/Study-suggests-cryptocurrency-owners-share-unique-psychological-and-political-traits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67ffade2-cec8-471e-9dee-e7d9e8a474ac Sun, 07 Jul 2024 20:31:00 -0400 Study suggests cryptocurrency owners share unique psychological and political traits
英国的死亡率趋势因肥胖而发生变化：心血管疾病死亡人数下降，神经系统和呼吸系统死亡人数上升2004 年至 2019 年间，英格兰与肥胖相关的死亡率呈现出复杂的趋势。虽然肥胖人群的总体死亡率有所下降，但该研究强调了死亡原因的变化，包括神经系统和呼吸系统死亡人数的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/England-sees-shifting-mortality-trends-with-obesity-Cardioangio-deaths-decline-neurological-and-respiratory-deaths-rise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240707/England-sees-shifting-mortality-trends-with-obesity-Cardioangio-deaths-decline-neurological-and-respiratory-deaths-rise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37799ea0-3d6b-48ea-856e-d39eaa0f16cd Sun, 07 Jul 2024 20:13:00 -0400 England sees shifting mortality trends with obesity: Cardiovascular deaths decline, neurological and respiratory deaths rise
噬菌体利用自私 DNA 智胜竞争对手历史上，所有生命王国的基因组中隐藏的奇怪 DNA 片段都被忽视了，因为它们似乎在生存竞争中没有发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Phages-use-selfish-DNA-to-outmaneuver-competitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Phages-use-selfish-DNA-to-outmaneuver-competitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14b28e34-3dd4-4473-9925-2ae010cf70e0 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 19:14:00 -0400 Phages use selfish DNA to outmaneuver competitors
突破性的人源化小鼠模型为免疫疗法的发展提供了新的见解生物医学研究的突破为免疫疗法开发和疾病建模带来了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Breakthrough- humanized-mouse-model-offers-new-insights-for-immunotherapy-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Breakthrough- humanized-mouse-model-offers-new-insights-for-immunotherapy-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffa4d238-98b2-4007-880e-c73b1c9b5143 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 19:03:00 -0400 Breakthrough humanized mouse model offers new insights for immunotherapy development
吸烟被认为是加速认知能力下降的关键因素伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，吸烟可能是影响我们随着年龄增长认知能力下降速度的最重要的生活方式因素之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Smoking-identified-as-key-factor-in-accelerated-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Smoking-identified-as-key-factor-in-accelerated-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc01ac15-b957-4707-b177-3ee50058a4bd Fri, 05 Jul 2024 13:07:00 -0400 Smoking identified as key factor in accelerated cognitive decline
Insilico Medicine 和复星医药交付第二个实体瘤治疗临床前候选药物Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能（AI）驱动的药物发现公司，于2024年6月与复星医药合作成功交付了第二个临床前候选化合物（PCC），这是一种潜在的创新治疗药物治疗实体瘤的合成致死策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Insilico-Medicine-and-Fosun-Pharma-deliver-second-preclinical-candidate-for-solid-tumor-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Insilico-Medicine-and-Fosun-Pharma-deliver-second-preclinical-candidate-for-solid-tumor-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c36eaff6-2113-489e-bc8a-2e9888522f96 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 12:57:00 -0400 Insilico Medicine and Fosun Pharma deliver second preclinical candidate for solid tumor treatment
专家就阿尔茨海默氏症恢复力中的性别和性别差异发表共识声明由巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 领导的国际专家小组已就以下问题达成共识：性别和性别在阿尔茨海默氏病恢复力方面的差异，并呼吁将这些差异纳入未来的研究中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Experts- Produce-consensus-statement-on-sex-and-gender-disparities-in-resilience-to-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240705/Experts-product-consensus-statement-on-sex-and-gender-disparities-in-resilience-to-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36b0b2a4-6261-4ed3-bac3-3aecce65a1e4 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 12:49:00 -0400 Experts produce consensus statement on sex and gender disparities in resilience to Alzheimer's
